cookies.accept-label: Accepts the use of cookies and proceeds to the app
cookies.decline-label: Declines cookie usage and exits the app
cookies.info-label: Opens a dialog with  the frag.jetzt privacy statement

overlay.message: You have declined cookie usage for this app, thus you can not use it for the time being.

data-protection.consent-label: Accept the app's privacy policy and close dialog
data-protection.deny-label: Decline the app's privacy policy and close dialog
data-protection.title: Data Protection

footer.accessibility-data_protection: Opens the frag.jetzt privacy statement in a new dialog
footer.accessibility-demo: Shows demo video of frag.jetzt in a new dialog
footer.accessibility-help: Opens help text in a new dialog
footer.accessibility-imprint: Opens the imprint in a new dialog
footer.beamer: Optimized for the projector (work in progress)
footer.wai: Accessible according to WCAG 2.1 (work in progress)
footer.will-open: will be opened in a new tab...

header.accessibility-back: Go back to the previous page
header.account-deleted: Your account has been deleted successfully.
header.close-demo: Close demo video and go back to login page
header.really-delete-account: Do you really want to irrevocably delete your account with the associated sessions?

home-page.accessibility-join: Enters the room with the specified session ID.
home-page.accessibility-join-input: Here you can enter the session ID of the room you want to join.
home-page.exactly-8: A session ID has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this ID
home-page.only-numbers: A session ID only contains digits.
home-page.room-name-input: Enter the name of the session you want to create here.

login.activation-key-input-description: Enter the activation key that you received by e-mail.
login.guest-login-tooltip: Created sessions will be deleted after logout.
login.login-tooltip: Sessions will be stored for 180 days.

password-reset.email-description: Enter your email address here to reset your password.
password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.

register.email-description-repeat: Please enter your e-mail address again to ensure that you have not mistyped.
register.password-description: Enter the password you want to register with here.
register.password-description-repeat: Please enter the password you want to register with again to make sure that you have not mistyped it.
register.register-request-error: Something went wrong with the registration. Maybe you already made the account?
register.register-successful: Successfully registered. Please check your mails.

room-list.filter: Here you can filter your visited sessions
room-list.filter-message: Filter by Name or Session ID
room-list.join-message-template: Join Session {{session}} with ID {{id}} and role {{role}}
room-list.no-room-history: You haven't joined any sessions yet.
room-list.session-history-1: Your session history contains one session.
room-list.session-history-label: Below you will find a list of the sessions attended.
